name: The Ooze
description:
In an ageless temple at the corner of the earth, a primordial Ooze sits waiting... Shift its shape to (gleefully) eliminate all trespassers.

The Ooze is a game created for Ludum Dare 35, "Shapeshift." I produced the code, art, and audio in 48 hours. Here's the Ludum Dare entry page!

The game should take around 5-15 minutes to complete. There is an ending so hang in there!

The controls of The Ooze are intended to be self evident when playing. If they aren't:

  • Mouse - Select ooze sections
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Expand ooze section
  • R - Reset level

Tools Used:

  • Unity3D
  • Photoshop
  • Audacity
  • Garage Band
  • BFXR
